alert.note: Alert for Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 1:03AM EDT until July 11 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Woodstock. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:46 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 9.1 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early this morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
